Dialogue.0: You pass a pair of beggars at the side of the road on your way to the {loc}.
Dialogue.1: They're dirty and skinny, huddled under threadbare cloaks that you know can't be doing anything to keep out the cold.
Dialogue.2: As you get close, one of them—the tall, extra-skinny one—reaches out a hand.
Dialogue.5: You see a glimmer of metal from between his fingers: a knife.
Dialogue.7: Give the beggar a couple coins.
Dialogue.11: You decide you're feeling charitable today!
Dialogue.14: But you don't have a couple coins! Instead, you give the beggar an apologetic look and turn away.
Dialogue.17: You step forward to hand over a couple coins, and the beggar gives you a slow, pained smile in return…
Dialogue.18: Before you can react, he darts forward and lunges at you—a moment later, a stinging pain erupts across your right leg.
Dialogue.19: As you stagger away, your money pouch spills open, scattering your hard-earned savings across the filthy street.
Dialogue.21: You eventually make your way to the {loc}, but even after your stab wound is patched up, you walk with a limp and a permanent scar to your pride.
Dialogue.24: You hurry away from the two, an unsettling feeling creeping into your bones.
Dialogue.25: When you look back moments later, they're both gone.
